titleStmt.title: A prayer or supplycation made vnto God by a yonge man that he woulde be mercifull to vs, and not kepe his worde away from vs, but that the truth maie springe / quod John Pyttes.
titleStmt.author: Pits, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at London in Aldersgate strete by William Herford,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.
